name: accept
description: Specifies the types of files that the server accepts (only for input type='file').

name: accept-charset
description: Specifies the character encodings to be used for form submission.

name: accesskey
description: Specifies a shortcut key to activate/focus an element.

name: action
description: Specifies where to send the form-data when a form is submitted.

name: align
description: Specifies the alignment of the element's content.

name: allow
description: Specifies a feature policy for the iframe.

name: alt
description: Provides alternative text for an image if it cannot be displayed.

name: async
description: Indicates that the script should be executed asynchronously.

name: autocapitalize
description: Controls how text input is automatically capitalized.

name: autocomplete
description: Specifies whether an input field should have autocomplete enabled.

name: autofocus
description: Specifies that an input field should automatically get focus when the page loads.

name: autoplay
description: Specifies that the audio/video should start playing as soon as it is ready.

name: background
description: Specifies a background image for the element.

name: bgcolor
description: Specifies the background color of an element.

name: border
description: Specifies the border width.

name: buffered
description: Contains the time ranges that the media element has buffered.

name: capture
description: Specifies that the camera should be used for input.

name: challenge
description: Specifies that the value of the keygen element should be challenged when submitted.

name: charset
description: Specifies the character encoding.

name: checked
description: Specifies that an input element should be pre-selected when the page loads.

name: cite
description: Specifies a URL that explains the quote, or why a text was inserted/deleted.

name: class
description: Specifies one or more class names for an element.

name: code
description: Specifies the URL of the applet's class file to be loaded and executed.

name: codebase
description: Specifies the base URL for an applet.

name: color
description: Specifies the text color of an element.

name: cols
description: Specifies the visible width of a text area.

name: colspan
description: Specifies the number of columns a cell should span.

name: content
description: Gives the value associated with the http-equiv or name attribute.

name: contenteditable
description: Specifies whether the content of an element is editable.

name: contextmenu
description: Specifies a context menu for an element.

name: controls
description: Specifies that audio/video controls should be displayed.

name: coords
description: Specifies the coordinates of an area in an image-map.

name: crossorigin
description: Configures the CORS requests for the element's fetched data.

name: csp
description: Allows specifying a Content Security Policy for the content in the iframe.

name: data
description: Specifies the URL of the resource to be used by the object.

name: datetime
description: Specifies the date and time.

name: decoding
description: Indicates how the browser should load the image.

name: default
description: Specifies the default track kind.

name: defer
description: Specifies that the script is executed when the page has finished parsing.

name: dir
description: Specifies the text direction for the content.

name: dirname
description: Enables the submission of the text directionality of an input field.

name: disabled
description: Specifies that an element should be disabled.

name: download
description: Specifies that the target will be downloaded when a user clicks on the hyperlink.

name: draggable
description: Specifies whether an element is draggable or not.

name: enctype
description: Specifies how the form-data should be encoded when submitting it to the server.

name: enterkeyhint
description: Specifies what action label to present for the enter key on virtual keyboards.

name: for
description: Specifies which form element a label or output element is bound to.

name: form
description: Specifies the form the element belongs to.

name: formaction
description: Specifies where to send the form-data when a form is submitted (for input and button elements).

name: formenctype
description: Specifies how form-data should be encoded (for input and button elements).

name: formmethod
description: Defines the HTTP method for sending form-data (for input and button elements).

name: formnovalidate
description: Defines that form elements should not be validated when submitted.

name: formtarget
description: Specifies where to display the response after submitting the form.

name: headers
description: Specifies one or more header cells a cell is related to.

name: height
description: Specifies the height of the element.

name: hidden
description: Specifies that an element is not yet, or is no longer, relevant.

name: high
description: Specifies the range that is considered to be a high value.

name: href
description: Specifies the URL of the page the link goes to.

name: hreflang
description: Specifies the language of the linked document.

name: http-equiv
description: Provides an HTTP header for the information/value of the content attribute.

name: icon
description: Specifies an icon for the command.

name: id
description: Specifies a unique id for an element.

name: importance
description: Indicates the relative fetch priority for the resource.

name: integrity
description: Allows a browser to verify the fetched resource's integrity.

name: ismap
description: Specifies an image as a server-side image-map.

name: itemprop
description: Defines a property of an item.

name: keytype
description: Specifies the security algorithm of a key.

name: kind
description: Specifies the kind of text track.

name: label
description: Specifies the title of the text track.

name: lang
description: Specifies the language of the element's content.

name: language
description: Deprecated. Specifies the scripting language used for the script.

name: loading
description: Indicates how the browser should load the image or iframe.

name: list
description: Refers to a datalist element that contains pre-defined options.

name: loop
description: Specifies that the audio/video will start over again, every time it is finished.

name: low
description: Specifies the range that is considered to be a low value.

name: manifest
description: Specifies the URL of the document's cache manifest.

name: max
description: Specifies the maximum value.

name: maxlength
description: Specifies the maximum number of characters allowed in an input field.

name: media
description: Specifies what media/device the linked document is optimized for.

name: method
description: Specifies the HTTP method to use when sending form-data.

name: min
description: Specifies the minimum value.

name: minlength
description: Specifies the minimum number of characters required in an input field.

name: multiple
description: Specifies that a user can enter more than one value.

name: muted
description: Specifies that the audio output should be muted.

name: name
description: Specifies the name of the element.

name: nomodule
description: Indicates that the script should not be executed in browsers that support module scripts.

name: nonce
description: A cryptographic nonce used in Content Security Policy.

name: novalidate
description: Specifies that the form should not be validated when submitted.

name: open
description: Specifies that the details should be visible to the user.

name: optimum
description: Specifies the optimal value of the gauge.

name: pattern
description: Specifies a regular expression that the input element's value is checked against.

name: ping
description: Specifies a space-separated list of URLs to be notified if a user follows the hyperlink.

name: placeholder
description: Specifies a short hint that describes the expected value of an input field.

name: playsinline
description: Indicates that the video should play inline on mobile devices.

name: poster
description: Specifies an image to be shown while the video is downloading or until the user hits the play button.

name: preload
description: Specifies if and how the author thinks the audio/video should be loaded when the page loads.

name: readonly
description: Specifies that the input field is read-only.

name: referrerpolicy
description: Specifies which referrer information to send when fetching a resource.

name: rel
description: Specifies the relationship between the current document and the linked document.

name: required
description: Specifies that the input field must be filled out before submitting the form.

name: reversed
description: Specifies that the list order should be descending (9,8,7...).

name: rows
description: Specifies the visible number of lines in a text area.

name: rowspan
description: Specifies the number of rows a cell should span.

name: sandbox
description: Enables an extra set of restrictions for the content in an iframe.

name: scope
description: Specifies whether a header cell is a header for a column, row, or group of columns or rows.

name: scoped
description: Specifies that the styles only apply to this element's parent and child elements.

name: selected
description: Specifies that an option should be pre-selected when the page loads.

name: shape
description: Specifies the shape of an area in an image-map.

name: size
description: Specifies the width, in characters, of an input field.

name: sizes
description: Specifies the sizes of icons for visual media.

name: slot
description: Assigns a slot in a shadow DOM shadow tree.

name: span
description: Defines the number of columns to span for a col or colgroup element.

name: spellcheck
description: Specifies whether the element is to have its spelling and grammar checked or not.

name: src
description: Specifies the URL of the media file.

name: srcdoc
description: Specifies the HTML content of the page to show in the iframe.

name: srclang
description: Specifies the language of the track text data (required if kind='subtitles').

name: srcset
description: Specifies the URL of the image to use in different situations.

name: start
description: Specifies the start value of an ordered list.

name: step
description: Specifies the legal number intervals for an input field.

name: style
description: Specifies an inline CSS style for an element.

name: summary
description: Specifies a summary of the content of a table (deprecated in HTML5).

name: tabindex
description: Specifies the tabbing order of an element.

name: target
description: Specifies where to open the linked document.

name: title
description: Specifies extra information about an element.

name: translate
description: Specifies whether the content of an element should be translated or not.

name: type
description: Specifies the type of element.

name: usemap
description: Specifies an image as a client-side image-map.

name: value
description: Specifies the value of the element.

name: width
description: Specifies the width of the element.

name: wrap
description: Specifies how the text in a text area is to be wrapped when submitted in a form.

name: aria-*
description: Defines accessibility semantics or ARIA properties.

name: data-*
description: Used to store custom data private to the page or application.

name: role
description: Defines the role of an element for accessibility purposes.
